title: Secrets Behind Indias Agriculture and Ecosystem Diversity #shorts

tasks.task: Drive a forklift onto a trailer
subtasks: Sit into the forklift and secure seatbelt
Adjust rearview mirrors for visibility
Correctly engage the forklift transmission
Smoothly drive the forklift onto the trailer
Align the forklift with the trailer's loading area

tasks.task: Offload lettuce heads from a trailer
subtasks: Exit the trailer and approach the pile of lettuce heads
Carefully pick up each lettuce head from the trailer
Assess the condition of each lettuce head for quality
Place the lettuce heads onto the packing table
Clean and wash the lettuce heads if necessary
Repeat steps for all lettuce heads on the trailer

tasks.task: Pack lettuce heads onto a flatbed trailer
subtasks: Position the packing table over the trailer's cavity
Stack the lettuce heads neatly on the table
Ensure even distribution and stability of the load
Secure the load with straps or nets
Seal the cavity to prevent produce from shifting

tasks.task: Drive a flatbed trailer loaded with lettuce to a delivery location
subtasks: Inspect the trailer's load for any shifting or damage
Adjust trailer load if necessary for optimal stability
Check tire pressure and road clearance
Secure the trailer hitch if required
Mount the trailer and drive to the delivery location
Unload the flatbed trailer at the destination

tasks.task: this involves exiting, approaching the pile, handling each head, maybe washing, and placing them on the table. That could be another MAINTASK.
moving them from the table to the trailer, stacking, securing, sealing. Another MAINTASK.
checking load, driving there, unloading. Another MAINTASK.
Hence, I think the answer is correct. The MAINTASKs are driving forklift on trailer, unloading lettuce, packing onto flatbed, and driving to delivery. Each with appropriate subtasks.
Drive a forklift onto a trailer
Offload lettuce heads from a trailer
Pack lettuce heads onto a flatbed trailer
Drive a flatbed trailer loaded with lettuce to a delivery location

exactly in the first MAINTASK, is "adjust rearview mirrors for visibility" appropriate? Yes, because when driving a forklift onto a trailer, making sure you can see is important. So rearview mirrors need adjusting.
Drive a forklift onto a trailer
Offload lettuce heads from a trailer
Pack lettuce heads onto a flatbed trailer
Drive a flatbed trailer loaded with lettuce to a delivery location
